price: Na watasema: Alhamdulillahi, Sifa njema zote ni za Mwenyezi Mungu aliye tuondolea huzuni zote. Hakika Mola wetu Mlezi bila ya shaka ni Mwenye kusamehe, Mwenye shukrani.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ
footnotes: Na watasema wakisha ingia: Sifa njema ni za Mwenyezi Mungu aliye tuondolea ya kutuhuzunisha. Hakika Mola wetu Mlezi ni Mwingi wa maghfira, Mwingi wa shukra.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī adhhaba ʿannā al-ḥazana inna rabbanā laghafūrun shakūrun
